setting.quit_hint: You are about to exit the application. The settings will take effect after the next startup
setting.name: Name

tutorial.error_a1:
1. Ensure the atmosphere and system firmware are up to date
2. Confirm that the system time is correct
3. Restore the default network settings, including IP, DNS, etc
4.Using in China
tutorial.error_a2:
1. Using a Fat32 format memory card
2. Ensure the atmosphere and system firmware are up to date
3. Waiting for developers to repair
tutorial.font_q1: How to set custom font or keymap icon
tutorial.font_a1:
1. Download the font or icon font you want
2. Rename font to: font.ttf; Rename icon to: icon.ttf
3. Place font files in the config directory
4. Restart the application
tutorial.font_a2:
1. Switchfin prioritizes the display of custom fonts, with built-in fonts as a fallback
2. "Settings - Tutorial" provides a menu item to quickly open the config directory
3. On Linux, Switchfin uses xdg-open to open the directory. If the configuration directory cannot be opened correctly, you can consider installing this tool
